original_title: Sri Lanka Sports Minister meets ICC CEO
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka's Sports Minister, Harin Fernando, and International Cricket Council (ICC) Chief Executive Officer, Geoff Allardice, held a productive meeting today to discuss the future of Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC).
The two leaders engaged in a "constructive discussion" focused on finding a way forward for the cricket administration body, which has faced internal challenges in recent times.
